name: Mysterious House
description:
If you like the genre of platformer and logic-tied puzzles, then you will like this game. The main task of the game is to get to the teleport, but the task is complicated by various obstacles that can be overcome by solving the puzzle.
Closed doors, assistants can open. The main thing is to remember, they are very stupid, so it is worth protecting them.
Some helpers copy your actions. The pits can be closed with boxes. Some blocks are destroyed by kosanai.
Be careful and then everything will work out!

Key features:
- Interesting puzzles
- Beautiful graphics
- Addictive gameplay
